sourcesContent:
import { Grid, Typography, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, TableBody, TableContainer, Table, Fab, } from "@material-ui/core"; import AddIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Add"; import formatMoney from "../lib/formatMoney"; export default function OrderItem({ items }) { return ( Tên SL Bán Niêm yết {items?.length ? items.map((item) => ( {item.product.name} {item.quantity} {formatMoney(item.price, 0)} {formatMoney(item.product.price, 0)} )) : null} Tổng
); }
